results.title: This Year Was a Disaster. We Hope the Sequel Is Better.
results.abstract: We streamed, we watched, we worried. We also wondered what the catastrophe called 2020 will mean for movies.
results.byline: By A.O. Scott and Manohla Dargis

multimedia.caption: People will want to go back to movie theaters when they can, our critics write, but some of the shifts brought about by the pandemic seem lasting.

results.abstract: For her first lead in a film, the actress wanted a character as challenging as many of those she’s played onstage. She found it in Kornel Mundruczo’s “Pieces of a Woman.”

results.title: A ‘Great Cultural Depression’ Looms for Legions of Unemployed Performers
